text: Nuvia (Lydrenex) Overview: The Power of Micro-Calm. 1. Introduction to Nuvia. Low-dose precision for limbic system. 2. Science of the Calm Window. Dose-dependency of Lydrenex. Table 1: The Lydrenex Dose Spectrum. 3. Mechanism: The Amygdala Shield.

sections.heading: 1. Introduction to Nuvia
sections.content: Utilizes low-dose Lydrenex to target cognitive anxiolysis without muscle paralysis.

text: Key Benefits: Social Fluidity, Non-Sedative, Sublingual delivery. 4. Differentiating from Veldra. Isolating the anxiolytic fraction of the response curve.

sections.heading: Key Benefits
sections.content: Addresses physical anxiety symptoms (heart rate) while maintaining presence.

sections.heading: 4. Differentiating from Veldra
sections.content: Strategic differentiation: Nuvia stays below the myorelaxant threshold to avoid physical lethargy.
